trans-unit.source: Represents a day on a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton"></xref> class.
Gets a value that indicates whether the date is unavailable.
`true` if the date unavailable; otherwise, `false`.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsBlackedOut"></xref> dependency property.
Gets a value that indicates whether this button is highlighted.
`true` if the button is highlighted; otherwise, `false`.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsHighlighted"></xref> dependency property.
Gets a value that indicates whether this button represents a day that is not in the currently displayed month.
When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> of a calendar is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode.Month>, it might display days that are not in that month.
For example, a calendar that shows March 2009 also displays the days February 22 through February 28 and April 1 through April 4.
Because those dates are not in the month of March, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarButton.IsInactive%2A> property is set to `true` for the buttons that represent those days.
`true` if the button represents a day that is not in the currently displayed month; otherwise, `false`.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsInactive"></xref> dependency property.
Gets a value that indicates whether the date represented by this button is selected.
`true` if the date is selected; otherwise, `false`.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsSelected"></xref> dependency property.
Gets a value that indicates whether the date represented by this button is the current date.
`true` if the date is the current date; otherwise, `false`.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton.IsToday"></xref> dependency property.
